dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. Probably issued in Ortelius' Theatrum orbis terrarum; this version of his Asia map appeared in the Theatrum from 1575 to 1612. cf. Broecke, M.P.R. van den, Ortelius atlas maps. Without text on verso; Broecke does not describe this issue.
